p.k: Crime, Mystery, Thriller, Art, Classic Uk (1935). Hrají: Robert Donat, Madeleine Carroll, Peggy Ashcroft. Režie: Alfred Hitchcock.
p.d: A man in London tries to help a counterespionage agent. But when the agent is killed and he stands accused, he must go on the run to both save himself and also stop a spy ring trying to steal top secret information.
